title: 03/11/22 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 03/11/22 DPS Best Of
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP recaps last night's Sixers/Nets game. Is the Harden/Embiid duo over-hyped? Jamal Crawford calls in and shares a story about how he helped Deandre Jordan with his free throws. And on the 2nd anniversary of the sports world shutting down because of covid, Scott Van Pelt calls in to share his experience from hosting Sports Center that night.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
